Text:

jack_mustang:

thank you for the answer, i will try your torrents as soon as i can.
Tried the uploader's setup, still doesn't work. Since this update, the game crashes whenever i try to start a new game (after the leader intro speech). tried numerous fixes to no avail :(

@reggadej
Apart from running as admin and/or changing the civ5 folder permission, I have no more possible solutions.
still cant get the game to start, i get a chinese message of some sort about steam and the game its not even starting. oh well
the "chinese message of some sort" is telling you to fucking close steam first.

At KAT DSpectre86 got it working with these torrents:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7047491/

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7375083/

He installed all and only the updates I listed earlier by 3DM.

@whiteorc
Try closing Steam and then launch the game. I had the same problem and that fixed it.
It was indeed that stupid steam, too bad my chinese level is 0 lol. Thank you very much for the torrent jack_mustang and for the help.
This is great! it didn't work at first, crashed on start screen but then i ran as admin and i haven't had any problems..ty uploader!

I cant seem to get it working. No admin problems had the game installed and working perfectly up to prior patches. Reinstalled and dl the suggested torrents. Still nothing. I click the game to start and it simply does not respond.

Got it to work...barely....
I used the Simon torrent in the links. What I got to is a loading screen of CiV vanilla and unsurprising missing all the DLCs (along with errors for missing textures), will retry with another version. In the interim any help/advice is appreciated.
Yup got it working! Only now it doesn't load games... :(
seems to be 100% working...  using REVOLT release main game, 1.0.1.674 3DM crackfix, 1.0.1.705 3DM patch and this torrent.
Well its working now after a couple uninstalls and reinstalls. However all I can load is saves made on steam cloud. The rest simply freeze. Any ideas?
